title: [Large-Scale] Student Success Strategies: High-Impact Learning and Practice Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in developing basic academic plans and ability to adapt to university life
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining smartphone-based VR simulations with formative assessment, emphasizing academic persistence and job-readiness competencies

learning_goals: Students can diagnose personalized learning strategies through VR simulations and develop customized learning plans.
Learners achieve 80% or higher performance in project-based tasks that apply high-impact teaching methods (active learning, feedback loops).
Over 75% of participants experience a 20% or greater increase in academic self-efficacy after 1:1 coaching based on simulation assessment data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
